Contact Parallel Wireless

Parallel Wireless Inc. maintains a website where you can find information on our company and its products. Use the following URL:

http://www.parallelwireless.com

Technical Assistance

When additional technical assistance is needed, please contact your Parallel Wireless Product Technical Support representative. If you experience a service-affecting problem, contact the Parallel Wireless Customer Technical Assistance Center (CTAC) immediately 9-5 GMT, weekdays by phone, or online through the Web portal.

Phone

US/International +1-603-689-7391

Email
